name: Santa's Workshop: Unhinged
storyline: One of Santa's other elves broke the toy machines while preparing for next christmas! Help Santa get rid of all the extra presents before next christmas is ruined! Quick, find places to get rid of them before the room fills up!
summary: Help! Santa's Toy Machine Broke! Quick, find places to get rid of all the presents before it's too late and the room fills up with too many of them!!!
